    public interface IDbCommand
extends IJCOBridgeReflected, IDisposable
    The base .NET class managing System.Data.IDbCommand, System.Data.Common, Version=9.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a.
